House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07908
FULL TITLE : AN ACT GRANTING FUNERAL AND MEMORIAL DISCOUNT PRIVILEGES TO ALL PUBLIC SCHOOL TEACHERS WHO DIED ON ACCOUNT OF WORK-RELATED SICKNESS AND INJURIES, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Provides 20% discount on funeral services and 10% discount on memorial lot to families of teachers who died on work-related sickness.
